name: mint seedling production, for planting | mint seedling, for planting | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/15242/documentation

This dataset represents the production of 1 mint seedling raised in a nursery during one year. From a mint nursery of 1 ha, seedlings for 12.5 ha productive mint fields can be obtained, i.e. a total of 11300000 seedlings are obtained from 1 ha nursery of one year. ;PEF-Quality: data quality rating (DQR) =2.5 (i.e. good quality);This dataset refers to an average situation; for specific situations exchanges might differ substantially due to site specific parameters.

The activity starts with soil cultivation of the field in order to establish a mint nursery for 1 year.

The inventory includes the processes of soil cultivation, planting, pesticide application, fertilisation and harvest. Machine infrastructure including a shed for shelter and fuel use are also considered as well as transport on farm. Inputs of fertilisers, pesticides, irrigation and seedlings are included. Direct field emissions from crop production activities (e.g. fertiliser and pesticide use) and land use change are considered. 
The activity ends with harvesting Mint seedlings.
category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/01:Crop and animal production, hunting and related service activities/013:Plant propagation/0130:Plant propagation

processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: If used, extrapolations are documented on the flow level.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription:
Inputs and Outputs for the seedling production are the same as for the activity 'mint production US' (United States of America) for 1 ha but with 11300000 seedlings for product output per year.
Data collection and direct field emissions follow the WFLDB Methodological Guidelines for the Life Cycle Inventory of Agricultural Products in the latest version, available at: (Report section: https://v30.ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/File/Reports). Data sources: Data were categorised from level 0 (L0) to level (L4) as follows: L0 = estimate, proxy; L1 = statistical data (e.g. FAOSTAT); L2 = L1 adapted to crop or country; L3 = literature data or approved L1 L2 by experts; medium detailing (i.e. kg of total N-fertiliser); L4 = L3 data of high detailing (i.e. portion N-fertiliser types).In this dataset data were obtained for yield: L3; Fertilisers: L3; Pesticides: L0; Machinery: L3, L0; Irrigation: L0. Detailed information about the sources used for data sampling can be taken from WFLDB 3.0 - Documentation, available at: (Report section: https://v30.ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/File/Reports).

exchanges.description: Reference flow: Yield = 1388887.5 seedlings/ha

Total amount of active substance/s of pesticides needed for the production of mint seedling, for planting is calculated to be circa 1.44E-06 kg. Pesticide/s used in this dataset is/are: 'cyclic N-compound', 'glyphosate'. The total amount of active substance/s is doubled in order to account for the packaging of the dilluted product of pesticide/s that is/are applied. Therefore, 2.88E-06 kg of packaging for pesticides is justified with this exchange.
